lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Michael German of AGA agreed and said, "Nevertheless, outlet for several hundred billion cubic feet of gas a year is significant in a glutted market."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: AGA's German said that while industrial consumers were concerned with regulatory issues in their long-range capital investment decisions, in the dual-fuel boiler market relied on spot purchases.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Demand for natural gas has failed to grow in proportion to the decline in oil deliveries because of concerns over unresolved regulatory issues in the United States, said industry analysts and gas utility company sources.
